comprehensive_overview: DDT is a powerful, flexible, scalable, and easy-to-use debugging and performance analysis tool for parallel and serial codes.
core_features: DDT offers intuitive graphical user interface, multi-language support for C, C++, and Fortran, advanced debugging capabilities, memory debugging, parallel debugging for MPI, OpenMP, and hybrid codes, performance analysis for identifying bottlenecks, debugging in a distributed environment, and efficient visualization of program behavior.
